name: Racket Knight
description:
Controls:

  • Right click: Serve ball
  • Left click: Swing  your racket (to hit balls or enemies)
  • Arrow keys / WASD: Navigate
  • Ctrl:  Crouch

Instructions:

  • Beat enemies with your racket
  • Careful not to get beat down!
  • Shoot balls at enemies to stun them
  • Reflect incoming balls to avoid getting stunned  


    Racket model: https://free3d.com/3d-model/tennis-racket-v3--693257.html
